entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McPherson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:01 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
